scripts.build: npm run sync && rm -rf ProbExtShield && mkdir ProbExtShield && cp -R src/* ProbExtShield && zip -r ProbExtShield-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip ProbExtShield && rm -rf ProbExtShield
scripts.push: git push origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.release: npm run sync && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release-gh: npm run release && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.gh-release: npm run push && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.refresh: npm run pull && npm run sync && git add . && git commit -m 'sync: updated from latest' && npm run push
scripts.version-patch: npm run sync && git add . && git commit -m 'prepare: bump patch version' && npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.version: npm run sync && git add src/manifest.json
